tests.description: Increase speed to 80.
Accelerate to 100.
Speed up to 120.
Go to speed 90.
Reach a speed of 110.
Reduce speed to 60.
Slow down to 40.
Decrease speed to 30.
Lower speed to 50.
Bring speed down to 70.
Accelerate to 100 and then reduce speed to 60.
Increase speed to 90, then slow down to 40.
Go to 120, after that decrease speed to 80.
Speed up to 70 and then bring speed down to 30.
Reach 100, then lower speed to 50.
Enable ACC.
Turn on adaptive cruise control.
Accelerate to 80 with ACC on.
Increase speed to 100 and enable ACC.
Disable ACC.
Turn off ACC and slow down to 40.
Enable ACC and maintain speed at 90.
Accelerate to 120, then turn on ACC.
Turn off adaptive cruise control and reduce speed to 60.
ACC active, increase speed to 110.
Change to the left lane.
Move to right lane.
Accelerate to 80 and change to left lane.
Reduce speed to 60 and move to the right lane.
Speed up to 100 then shift to left lane.
Slow down to 40 and change to right lane.
Reach 90, then change to the left lane.
Go to 70 and then move to right lane.
Accelerate to 110, change to left lane, then reduce speed to 80.
Increase speed to 120 and shift to right lane.
Accelerate to 100, enable ACC, then reduce speed to 70 and change to the left lane.
Increase speed to 120, move to right lane, then slow down to 80.
Turn on ACC, go to 90, then turn off ACC and reduce speed to 50.
Speed up to 110, change to left lane, then bring speed down to 60.
Accelerate to 130, maintain speed, then slow down to 90 and move to right lane.
Start from standstill and accelerate to 50.
From rest, increase speed to 70.
Accelerate to 90, then maintain speed at 90.
Slow down to 30 for the curve, then accelerate to 80.
Go to 100, hold speed, then reduce speed to 60.
Accelerate to 140 for overtaking, then bring speed down to 100.
Increase speed to 110 and then change to the left lane.
Reduce speed to 40, then move to the right lane and accelerate to 70.
Enable ACC, accelerate to 90, then disable ACC and slow down to 50.
Speed up to 120, shift to left lane, enable ACC, then reduce speed to 80.
